# OJT Data Generator

A simple Python package to generate fake data for testing and development purposes.

## Features

Generate fake data with multiple templates:
- User data (name, username, email, phone, gender, DOB)
- Employee data (name, ID, email, department, salary)
- Student data (name, ID, GPA, year)
- Product data (name, price, stock)
- Bank account data (account number, holder, balance)
- Patient data (name, ID, height, weight)

## Installation

```bash
pip install ojt-data-generator
```

## Usage

Run the CLI tool:

```bash
ojt
```
